meanings.sent1: She accidentally fractured the glass when she dropped it.

meanings.definition: To cause a fracture in something
meanings.sent1: The heavy impact fractured the wall, creating a hole.
meanings.sent2: The intense pressure can fracture even the strongest materials.
meanings.sent3: His joke fractured the serious atmosphere of the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal fractured their trust in each other.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon carefully fractured the bone to set it properly.
